All Of My Treasures!: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.
Pounding Surprise: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.
Sparkling Burst: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.
